name: Stoutland
description: The Big-Hearted Pokémon. This extremely wise Pokémon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage, and its speed is doubled in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: This Pokémon's Normal and Fighting type moves ignore immunities granted by a Pokémon's type. If a target’s secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the attack, it follows the secondary type for that effect.
